code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axiosClient from"./api/axiosClient";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const submit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axiosClient.post("/api/login",{username,password});localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token);localStorage.setItem("role",res.data.role);window.location.href="/";}catch(error){alert("Đăng nhập thất bại");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u0110\u0103ng nh\u1EADp Admin"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:submit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"\u0110\u0103ng nh\u1EADp"})]})]});}export default Login;
